summary: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio recently addressed the Munich Security Conference, offering reassurance to European leaders about the US's commitment to their long-standing partnership. This statement comes at a time of uncertainty for European leaders. Rubio's softer tone on Europe has been met with interest from European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen and UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer. In an interview with CNN, von der Leyen and Starmer shared their reactions to Rubio's speech, as well as their thoughts on Ukraine negotiations. Starmer also discussed his political position, providing insight into the UK's stance on these matters. The discussion highlights the complex dynamics at play in international relations, with various leaders navigating their relationships and alliances.
